summary: Adds Phitt\'s Cliff Racers to Solstheim.
descriptionHtml:
DESCRIPTION

This mod adds Cliff Racers from Phitt\'s Cliffracers mod ( http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/8579 ) to the southern parts of Solstheim.

The Cliff Racers are passive critters just like hawks and can be shot down.
A collectible food item (Cliffracer Tails) and a recipe for stew are included.

This mod works as a standalone plugin, i.e. you don\'t need Phitt\'s original mod, although I\'d highly recommend using that as well. Both mods can be used at the same time.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
INSTALLATION

Install all files (Cliffracers_Solstheim.esp, Cliffracers_Solstheim.bsa) to your Data folder, or install with NMM.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
VERSION HISTORY

1.0 Initial release

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
CREDITS

Phitt - for the original mod and all resources, and the permission to use them.

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DISTRIBUTION

Do whatever you like, as long as you comply with Phitt\'s original request:
\"This is also a modders resource, if you want to use the cliffracer models in your mod you have my permission to do that, just give credits.\"
author: Varana
